name: PUT A NAME TO A FACE

system.description: When you put a name to a face or vice versa, roll with their Circle.

miss.label: Miss
miss.value: The MC tells you what interesting thing happens.

weakHit.label: Weak Hit
weakHit.value: On a hit, you know their reputation; the MC will tell you what most people know about them.

strongHit.label: Strong Hit
strongHit.value: On a hit, you know their reputation; the MC will tell you what most people know about them. On a 10+, you've dealt with them before; learn something interesting and useful about them or they owe you a Debt, your choice.
